skos:definition.@value: Kauf ist die Erwerbung eines Dokuments bei der der Erwerber ein Aequivalent in Geld entrichtet

- Contrato en virtud del cual «uno de los contratantes se obliga a entregar una cosa determinada y el otro a pagar por ella un precio cierto en dinero o signo que lo represente».- Contrato «en virtud del cual el empresario transmita o se comprometa a transmitir a un consumidor la propiedad de ciertos bienes y el consumidor pague o se comprometa a pagar su precio incluido cualquier contrato cuyo objeto esté constituido a la vez por bienes y servicios.»
gegenseitiger Vertrag durch den sich der Kaeufer zur Zahlung des Kaufpreises der Verkaeufer zur Uebereignung einer Sache oder zur Uebertragung eines Rechts verpflichten

1 The act of and the function of responsibility for the acquisition of equipment materials supplies and services including: buying determining the need selecting the supplier arriving at a fair and reasonable price and terms and conditions preparing the contract or purchase order and follow up. 2 Transmission of property from one person to another by voluntary act and agreement founded on a valuable consideration. In a technical and broader meaning relative to land generally means the acquisition of real estate by any means whatever except by descent. Includes taking by sale discount negotiation mortgage pledge lien issue or re-issue gift or any other voluntary transaction creating an interest in property. The term "purchase" includes any contract to purchase or otherwise acquire.
